wiki.summary: “CORAZÓN VACÍO” was described by Becerra as a “llori-perreo”, that is, a song to cry and dance at the same time. Throughout the lyrics, a situation is recounted in which the protagonist finds out about her partner's infidelity, comparing that feeling to ending up completely empty. Despite that, there is a message of overcoming and moving forward despite the difficulties. In early 2023, a snippet was posted as a teaser on TikTok, which quickly went viral Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “CORAZÓN VACÍO” was described by Becerra as a “llori-perreo”, that is, a song to cry and dance at the same time. Throughout the lyrics, a situation is recounted in which the protagonist finds out about her partner's infidelity, comparing that feeling to ending up completely empty. Despite that, there is a message of overcoming and moving forward despite the difficulties. In early 2023, a snippet was posted as a teaser on TikTok, which quickly went viral, creating a trend on the platform and leading fans to ask the singer to release the song for a couple of months. Later, Maria announced that it would be a collaboration, however, this was not liked by the public. Weeks later, Maria posted a photo on Twitter that hinted at the release of the single. After this, the singer confirmed the launch by publishing a tweet advancing another piece of the lyrics. Two days later, she shared the official cover with the release date, ruling out that the song was a collaboration as initially established. The music video tells the story of a single mother and goes through various stages of the character's life. Before its release, Becerra spoke about the video in an interview, mentioning that it would be entirely acting, like a “mini movie.” Read more on Last.fm.
